Author: bunchofbroccoli
Text: Yeah, I have IBS and get constipated *really* easily. There are very few things that my stomach can handle. I'd rather eat nothing than deal with the physical consequences of eating sometimes. It is definitely a driving factor in my restriction.

Author: makkkz
Text: I may be a little masochist in this sense but I like the way that lactose fucks me up. It's like a punishment for eating. And free lax too  ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
